reasoning: CRD7 is a rare inherited retinal dystrophy with autosomal recessive inheritance. Progressive vision loss affecting both cone and rod photoreceptors. Global incidence estimated 0.2-0.5 per 100k person-years based on inherited retinal disease registries. Point estimate 0.3 per 100k.
source: Koenekoop RK. (2005). Gene families for retinal dystrophies. Ophthalmic Genet. 26(1):3-15
